name: SCREAM // LINE TEST // 2002
description: this is a gem from a time when I was about to become an animator officially... a time when we did everything on paper... a time when we couldn't even dream of a graphic tablet... a time when we needed acme punchers and pegbars to align the frames by hand... a time when you had to rely purely on your eyes instead of virtual onion skins... a time with computers with only 16 MB of Ram.
